content: I've already read Attack on Titan and Fullmetal Alchemist, but the other suggestions sound great. I'll add Yona of the Dawn and The Ancient Magus' Bride to my reading list. By the way, I've been meaning to ask, do you have any tips on how to keep track of the books I've read and want to read? I've been using Goodreads, but I'm curious about other options.
